message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the money loses value faster for me.
Your cut loses value faster Alice, how about we meet a bit closer to the middle?
I understand the inflation affects me more, but I need at least this much to make it worthwhile, Bob.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a pretty good deal considering the inflation.
This is my final offer, Bob.  We both lose if we don't agree soon.
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the fairest and ensures we both get something.
